text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/077cc7aa0e0c431e97795612374fe17fe7c88803|patch 8.2.1588: cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer>
patch 8.2.1588: cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer

Problem:    Cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer.
Solution:   Add prompt_getprompt(). (Ben Jackson, closes #6851)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1588: cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer · vim/vim@077cc7a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1588: cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer · vim/vim@077cc7a
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot read back the prompt of a prompt buffer. Solution: Add prompt_getprompt(). (Ben Jackson, closes #6851)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/eadee486c70946ad0e1746d77898d6f4f4acc817|patch 8.2.1587: loop for handling keys for the command line is too long>
patch 8.2.1587: loop for handling keys for the command line is too long

Problem:    Loop for handling keys for the command line is too long.
Solution:   Move wild menu handling to separate functions. (Yegappan
            Lakshmanan, closes #6856)

attachments.text: Problem: Loop for handling keys for the command line is too long. Solution: Move wild menu handling to separate functions. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6856)

patch 8.2.1586: :resize command not fully tested

Problem:    :resize command not fully tested.
Solution:   Add a couple of tests. (Dominique Pellé, closes #6857)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fa57335e532e505ce9229ddb2354a593fb057561|patch 8.2.1585: messages in globals.h not translated>
patch 8.2.1585: messages in globals.h not translated

Problem:    Messages in globals.h not translated, xgettext on MS-Windows not
            fully supported.
Solution:   Add globals.h to list of input files.  Update MS-Windows makefiles
            to improve message translations. (Ken Takata, closes #6858)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1585: messages in globals.h not translated · vim/vim@fa57335
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1585: messages in globals.h not translated · vim/vim@fa57335
attachments.text: Problem: Messages in globals.h not translated, xgettext on MS-Windows not fully supported. Solution: Add globals.h to list of input files. Update MS-Windows makefiles ...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/eb24556df3b16a19009ee3ddee8ae94dc058a3b2|patch 8.2.1584: Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find()>
patch 8.2.1584: Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find()

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find().
Solution:   Use dict_get_bool() instead of tv_get_number(). (closes #6852)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1584: Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find() · vim/vim@eb24556
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1584: Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find() · vim/vim@eb24556
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot use "true" for "skipstart" in prop_find(). Solution: Use dict_get_bool() instead of tv_get_number(). (closes #6852)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/18eedfa40b45b1de955d61417e9918ef7d6e83f9|patch 8.2.1583: MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage>
patch 8.2.1583: MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage

Problem:    MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage.
Solution:   Add the COVERAGE option. (Ken Takata, closes #6842)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1583: MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage · vim/vim@18eedfa
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1583: MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage · vim/vim@18eedfa
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: cannot easily measure code coverage. Solution: Add the COVERAGE option. (Ken Takata, closes #6842)

patch 8.2.1582: the channel log does not show typed text

Problem:    The channel log does not show typed text.
Solution:   Add raw typed text to the log file.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1582: the channel log does not show typed text · vim/vim@7ca86fe
attachments.text: Problem: The channel log does not show typed text. Solution: Add raw typed text to the log file.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1f42f5a675fdab9ce5cdafbecea59c45e81f7ff8|patch 8.2.1581: using line() for global popup window doesn't work>
patch 8.2.1581: using line() for global popup window doesn't work

Problem:    Using line() for global popup window doesn't work.
Solution:   Set tabpage to "curtab". (closes #6847)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1581: using line() for global popup window doesn't work · vim/vim@1f42f5a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1581: using line() for global popup window doesn't work · vim/vim@1f42f5a
attachments.text: Problem: Using line() for global popup window doesn't work. Solution: Set tabpage to "curtab". (closes #6847)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a60053b8f4cc7e135ba9496a8f4855d26aee09e7|patch 8.2.1580: wildmenu does not work properly>
patch 8.2.1580: wildmenu does not work properly

Problem:    Wildmenu does not work properly.
Solution:   Do not call may_do_incsearch_highlighting() if completion is in
            progress.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1580: wildmenu does not work properly · vim/vim@a60053b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1580: wildmenu does not work properly · vim/vim@a60053b
attachments.text: Problem: Wildmenu does not work properly. Solution: Do not call may_do_incsearch_highlighting() if completion is in progress.
